title: Introduction to Computer Science
description: Fundamental concepts of computer science including programming, algorithms, and data structures.

title: Data Structures and Algorithms
description: Advanced study of data structures, algorithm design, and complexity analysis.

title: Database Systems
description: Design and implementation of database systems, SQL, and database management.

title: Calculus I
description: Differential calculus with applications to physical sciences and engineering.

title: Statistics and Probability
description: Introduction to statistical methods, probability theory, and data analysis.

title: Linear Algebra
description: Vector spaces, matrices, eigenvalues, and linear transformations.

title: Introduction to Psychology
description: Basic principles of psychology including cognition, behavior, and mental processes.

title: Research Methods in Psychology
description: Statistical methods and experimental design in psychological research.
